title: Shawn Mendes, Camila Cabello pack on serious PDA to show fans how they 'really kiss'
text:
Camila Cabello and Shawn Mendes are, apparently, really hurt over fans' criticism of how they kiss in public.

So, the two decided to poke fun at the critics and posted a video of how the two really suck face. And "suck face" is, by far, the most appropriate way to describe the Instagram post.

Mendes prefaces the video with a call out to fans that say he and Mendes "kiss like fish."

"So, we wanna show you how we really kiss," he say, before the two slowly, and romantically, lean toward the other.

The two hit adult comedy tier as they over-exaggerate their makeout session for a full 14 seconds before Camila breaks away, laughing.

Fans naturally went wild in the comments section of the video, which has already received over 11 million views since being posted Wednesday night.

Singer Charlie Puth and former One Direction star Niall Horan were among the celebs in the comments who posted expressing how funny they thought it was.

So now the world knows that Mendes and Cabello really can kiss like fish.

You're welcome?
description: Camila Cabello and Shawn Mendes shared a bizarre video of them kissing on Wednesday.
